# width

**Instance Property**

The table column’s width, in points.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var width: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is `100.0`.

If the value of this property exceeds the minimum or maximum width, it’s adjusted to the appropriate limiting value.

This property posts [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView/columnDidResizeNotification] on behalf of the table column’s `NSTableView` and marks the table view as needing display.

## Controlling Size

- **minWidth**: The table column’s minimum width, in points.
- **maxWidth**: The table column’s maximum width, in points.
- **resizingMask**: The table column’s resizing mask.
- **sizeToFit()**: Resizes the table column to fit the width of its header cell.
